name: NMB Bank Charges in Bank Transaction
query:
SELECT b.account deposit AS "Deposit:Currency/currency:", withdrawal AS "Withdrawal:Currency/currency:", description, currency
FROM `tabBank Transaction` bt
INNER JOIN `tabBank Account` b on bt.bank_account = b.name
WHERE bank_account = %(bank_account)s
   AND date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
   AND (description LIKE "%%VAT Payable on Comm and Fees%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%Cash Withdraw charge%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%Commission on Funds Transfer%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%IB Fund Transfer Fee%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%Cheque Withdrawal fees%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%Monthly fee for Savings and Current Accounts%%"
   OR description LIKE "%%MC QUARTERLY CARD MNT FEE%%")
report_name: NMB Bank Charges in Bank Transaction
